\usepackage{xcolor}

\newcommand{\notetp}[1]{{\color{blue}[{\bf Thomas:} #1]}}
\newcommand{\noteae}[1]{{\color{magenta}[{\bf Aaron:} #1]}}
\newcommand{\notemis}[1]{{\color{teal}[{\bf Margo:} #1]}}
\newcommand{\notesmis}[1]{{\color{teal}[{\bf Margo:} #1]}}
\newcommand{\notebl}[1]{{\color{orange}[{\bf Barb:} #1]}}
\newcommand{\noteeb}[1]{{\color{brown}[{\bf Emery:} #1]}}


\newcommand{\change}[1]{{\color{orange}#1}}

\definecolor{codegreen}{rgb}{0,0.6,0}
\definecolor{codegray}{rgb}{0.5,0.5,0.5}
\definecolor{codepurple}{rgb}{0.58,0,0.82}
\definecolor{backcolour}{rgb}{0.95,0.95,0.92}

\lstdefinestyle{mystyle}{
	backgroundcolor=\color{backcolour},
%	commentstyle=\color{codegreen},
%	keywordstyle=\color{magenta},
	numberstyle=\tiny\color{codegray},
%	stringstyle=\color{codepurple},
	basicstyle=\scriptsize\ttfamily,
	breakatwhitespace=false,
	breaklines=true,
	captionpos=b,
	keepspaces=true,
	numbers=left,
	numbersep=5pt,
	showspaces=false,
	showstringspaces=false,
	showtabs=false,
	tabsize=2,
	deletekeywords={create,data,debug,df,diff,file,frame,get,parse,quit,save,zip}
}

\lstdefinestyle{mystyle-nonumber}{
	backgroundcolor=\color{backcolour},
%	commentstyle=\color{codegreen},
%	keywordstyle=\color{magenta},
%	numberstyle=\tiny\color{codegray},
%	stringstyle=\color{codepurple},
	basicstyle=\scriptsize\ttfamily,
	breakatwhitespace=false,
	breaklines=true,
	captionpos=b,
	keepspaces=true,
	numbers=none,
	numbersep=5pt,
	showspaces=false,
	showstringspaces=false,
	showtabs=false,
	tabsize=2
}

\renewcommand{\figureautorefname}{Figure~}
\renewcommand{\tableautorefname}{Table}
\renewcommand{\sectionautorefname}{\S}
\renewcommand{\subsectionautorefname}{\S}
\renewcommand{\subsubsectionautorefname}{\S}
\providecommand*{\listingautorefname}{Listing}

\begin{article}
